text: “Nena: “Ngati makolo anu, ana anu, abale anu, akazi anu, ndi anansi anu ndi chuma chimene mwachipata, ndi malonda anu amene mukuopa kuti angaonongeke, ndi nyumba zanu zimene mukuzikonda, (ngati zinthuzi zili) zokondeka kwamhiri kwa inu kuposa Allah ndi Mtumiki Wake ndi kuchita Jihâd pa njira Yake, choncho dikirani kufikira Allah adzabwera ndi lamulo Lake (lokukhaulitsani). Ndipo Allah satsogolera anthu otuluka m’chilamulo (Chake)
